projects.title: Rock, paper, scissors
projects.body: Another project made with frontend mentor, you can play rock, paper, scissors with the pc as well as playing and perhaps learning a bonus game of rock, paper, scissors.

projects.title: Audiophile ecommerce
projects.body: This is a project made as a frontend mentor project, it is currently only working properly in the PC version, but it's an example of an ecommerce website, where you can add to the cart and purchase an item.

projects.title: Kahiit
projects.body: This is a beta project. It is a teaching tool to make questionaries with different game styles, you can play with a roulette by topic, or a traditional style with time questions and answers. This game is played by connecting a by a localserver, you just need a computer and the students can access to it with their phone.

links.text: Watch a video test on YouTube

projects.title: My first portfolio webpage
projects.body: I first made a different website, inspired by the fixed style from IT websites I've seen on the net, but I changed it to have a fresh style more according to my usual designs.
